comment.text: This key displays "MCP Server" as the title of a dialog used for configuring or adding an MCP server connection within the AI settings. It appears in the header of the dialog and as a value in a tooltip on a button. Translators should ensure the meaning is clear to users managing AI server connections.

usage.context:
visible
 displayType={ModalDialogType.aside}
 onClose={onClose}
 withBodyScroll
 >
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("AISettings:MCPServer")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <div className={styles.bodyContainer}>
 <div className={styles.connectDocspace}>
 <Text className={styles.connectDocspaceDescription}>
 {t("AISettings:ConnectProductToYourDataAndTools", {

visible
 displayType={ModalDialogType.aside}
 onClose={onClose}
 withBodyScroll
 >
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("AISettings:MCPServer")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <div className={styles.bodyContainer}>
 <div className={styles.connectDocspace}>
 <Text className={styles.connectDocspaceDescription}>
 {t("AISettings:ConnectProductToYourDataAndTools", {

<MCPIcon title={item.name} imgSrc={icon} size={MCPIconSize.Large} />
 }
 tooltipText={
 disableActions
 ? t("AISettings:ToUseAddProvider", {
 value: t("AISettings:MCPServer"),
 })
 : undefined
 }
 >
 <AiTile.Header title={item.name}>
